Operation 'UpdateAccountState' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, poor_ai_interpretability. Original description is too minimal for AI agent interpretation. Added clarity on: (1) what 'state' means in provisioning context, (2) required inputs (account ID and state value), (3) that state transitions may be constrained, (4) what is returned, (5) side effects on service and billing. This helps agents understand when and how to use this operation.

data.current_description: Update the state of the specified account.
data.description_suggestion: Updates the state of a specified provisioned account. Requires the account ID in the path and a state value in the request body. Valid state transitions depend on the account's current provisioning status. Returns the updated account state object. This operation modifies the account's provisioning state, which may affect service availability and billing.
data.reasoning: Original description is too minimal for AI agent interpretation. Added clarity on: (1) what 'state' means in provisioning context, (2) required inputs (account ID and state value), (3) that state transitions may be constrained, (4) what is returned, (5) side effects on service and billing. This helps agents understand when and how to use this operation.

message: Operation 'ListOffering' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Original description lacks domain context and specificity. Enhanced with: (1) clarification that offerings include both packages and add-ons, (2) concrete examples (marketing campaigns, dedicated IPs, EASE), (3) explicit return type and pagination info, (4) use case guidance for agents. This helps AI agents understand the offering catalog structure and when to call this operation.

data.current_description: Retrieves offerings available under the organization.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all offerings (packages and add-ons) available for provisioning under the reseller organization. Offerings include email infrastructure packages and add-ons such as marketing campaigns, dedicated IP addresses, and EASE. Returns a paginated list of AccountProvisioningOfferingV1 objects. No authentication beyond standard API key is required. Use this to discover what offerings can be provisioned for customer accounts.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks domain context and specificity. Enhanced with: (1) clarification that offerings include both packages and add-ons, (2) concrete examples (marketing campaigns, dedicated IPs, EASE), (3) explicit return type and pagination info, (4) use case guidance for agents. This helps AI agents understand the offering catalog structure and when to call this operation.

message: Operation 'ListAccount' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary is too generic. Description lacks details about pagination support, filtering capabilities, and return structure. AI agents need to understand pagination parameters and response format to use this operation effectively.

data.current_description: Retrieves all accounts under the organization.
data.summary_suggestion: List all accounts in the organization
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of all accounts under the organization. Supports filtering and pagination parameters. Returns an array of account objects containing account IDs, profiles, and metadata.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description lacks details about pagination support, filtering capabilities, and return structure. AI agents need to understand pagination parameters and response format to use this operation effectively.

message: Operation 'CreateAccount' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary lacks specificity about what type of account and offering context. Description missing details about required request fields, response structure, and account provisioning state. AI agents need clarity on what inputs are required and what the created account state will be.

data.current_description: Creates a new account, with specified offering, under the organization.
data.summary_suggestion: Create a new customer account with offering
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new customer account under the organization with a specified package offering. Requires account profile information and offering details in the request body. Returns the newly created account object with assigned account ID. The account is immediately provisioned and ready for use.
data.reasoning: Summary lacks specificity about what type of account and offering context. Description missing details about required request fields, response structure, and account provisioning state. AI agents need clarity on what inputs are required and what the created account state will be.

message: Operation 'ListAccountOffering' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_output_details. Summary is vague about what 'offerings' means in this context. Description lacks specificity about offering types (package vs add-ons) and return structure. AI agents need to understand the distinction between package and add-on offerings to properly interpret the response.

data.current_description: Retrieves offering information about the specified account.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve offerings for a specific account
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all offerings (package and add-ons) currently associated with the specified account. Returns offering details including offering type, status, and configuration. Includes both the primary package offering and any associated add-on offerings such as Marketing Campaigns, Dedicated IP Addresses, and Expert Services.
data.reasoning: Summary is vague about what 'offerings' means in this context. Description lacks specificity about offering types (package vs add-ons) and return structure. AI agents need to understand the distinction between package and add-on offerings to properly interpret the response.

message: Operation 'UpdateAccountOffering' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary is adequate. Description explains the constraint about single package offering but lacks details about request format, response structure, and side effects on billing. AI agents need to understand that this operation modifies account capabilities and billing immediately.

data.current_description: Changes a package offering for the specified account. Please note that an account can have only one package offering. Also associates one or more add-on offerings such as Marketing Campaigns, Dedicated IP Addresses, and Expert Services to the specified account.
data.description_suggestion: Updates the package and add-on offerings for the specified account. Replaces the existing package offering with a new one (only one package offering allowed per account). Associates or updates add-on offerings such as Marketing Campaigns, Dedicated IP Addresses, and Expert Services. Requires offering details in request body. Returns the updated offerings configuration. Changes take effect immediately and may affect billing.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate. Description explains the constraint about single package offering but lacks details about request format, response structure, and side effects on billing. AI agents need to understand that this operation modifies account capabilities and billing immediately.

message: Operation 'AuthenticateAccount' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary doesn't clarify that this generates an auth link/token rather than just authenticating. Description lacks details about what is returned (URL, token, redirect), authentication requirements, and prerequisites. AI agents need to understand the return value to properly use this operation in authentication workflows.

data.current_summary: Authenticate an account with single sign on
data.current_description: Authenticates and logs in a user to Twilio Sendgrid as a specific admin identity configured for SSO by partner. Any additional teammates or subusers will need to log in directly via app.sendgrid.com
data.summary_suggestion: Generate SSO authentication link for account admin
data.description_suggestion: Generates a single sign-on (SSO) authentication link that logs in a user to Twilio SendGrid as the configured admin identity for the specified account. The operation returns an authentication URL or token for immediate account access. Note that additional teammates and subusers must log in separately via app.sendgrid.com. This operation requires the account to have SSO configured.
data.reasoning: Summary doesn't clarify that this generates an auth link/token rather than just authenticating. Description lacks details about what is returned (URL, token, redirect), authentication requirements, and prerequisites. AI agents need to understand the return value to properly use this operation in authentication workflows.

message: Operation 'GetAccountState' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_context. Summary is adequate. Description is too vague about what 'state' means and what values are possible. Missing context about what account states exist and their implications. AI agents need to understand possible state values and what each state means for account functionality.

data.current_description: Retrieve the state of the specified account.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the current operational state of the specified account. Returns the account state indicating whether the account is active, suspended, or in another state. The state reflects the account's ability to send emails and access SendGrid services.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate. Description is too vague about what 'state' means and what values are possible. Missing context about what account states exist and their implications. AI agents need to understand possible state values and what each state means for account functionality.
